授業目的: The aim here is to work with students from various cultural backgrounds to achieve a common business goal. Moreover, the business concepts taught in this course are practical for common use.
到達目標: By taking this course, students will improve their understanding of global business, cross-cultural competency, analytical skills, and international team building including online communication and project management skills.
授業方法:
This course is divided into two parts; the online period (remote) and the on-site period (in Japan). The online period will be from June to July, and will consist of 7 to 8 short videos paired with 4 or 5 short assignments. The online period also includes Zoom sessions with the classmates in order to get to know each other.

The on-site period will take place in August in Japan. The venue will be one of the Kwansei Gakuin University campuses. The teams will be given several days to brush up their business plans and prepare for their final presentations. During the tutorials, the students will conduct preliminary presentations and meet with the representatives of the companies/organizations to get their advice. The final presentation will be conducted as a competition-style event where all teams present their business plans to the representatives of the companies/organizations.
